DESCRIPTION: 进入这一 #y姿态 时，失去 [W] [W] 。你不能改变 #y姿态 。你在下回合开始时自动离开这一 #y姿态 。
黏液是耗能为1的 #y状态牌 。

NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Injury Curse card from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: Slow creatures take #b10% more damage from Attacks for each previous card played that turn.

DESCRIPTION: 蒸汽牌取材自你的药水，但效果较微弱。它们具有 保留 和 消耗 。
